item.title: Three Ireland Competition Launches
item.description: Â Â Three Ireland Reviewing Competition Three IrelandÂ in conjunction withÂ Newstalk Radio,Â KlipschÂ and LouderVoice have just launched a reviewing competition for listeners in Ireland of George Hook on theÂ Right Hook Radio Show. Each week for the next four weeks, the best reviewer can win a Three Ireland handset plus Klipsch Custom-1 headphones. You can send reviews by SMS or write them directly here on the site
